Name: French Governor
Ingredients: 30 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
History: Israeli Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Omer Gazit Shalev, 223 Cocktail Bar, Tel Aviv. Omer's original recipe calls for 10 ml homemade tarragon syrup.
Nutrition: One serving of French Governor contains 133 calories
